meanings.sent1: The puppy looked the saddest when it lost its favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: She felt the saddest when her best friend moved away.
meanings.sent3: Even the sunniest day couldn't chase away the saddest feeling in her heart.
meanings.sent4: The saddest melody played by the violin echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The saddest expression on his face made everyone want to comfort him.

meanings.definition: Causing or characterized by sorrow or regret.
meanings.sent1: The saddest news of the day was the cancellation of the concert.
meanings.sent2: The saddest movie she had ever seen left her in tears.
meanings.sent3: The saddest joke he told actually made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The saddest storm clouds loomed over the horizon, signaling a downpour.
meanings.sent5: The saddest memory lingered in her mind, haunting her dreams at night.
